sourcesContent: import { Button, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, FormGroup, Label, Row, Col, } from "reactstrap"; import { LocalForm, Control, Errors } from "react-redux-form"; export const AddStaffs= () =>{ const required = (val) => val && val.length; const maxLength = (len) => (val) => !val || val.length <= len; const minLength = (len) => (val) => val && val.length >= len; const isNumber = (val) => !Number.isNaN(Number(val)); const numRange = (val) => val > 0 && val < 4; return ( <> {/* Form thêm nhân viên */} Thêm nhân viên { this.handleSubmit(value); }} > ) }
